Reviews.Title: Dad loves it
Reviews.Author: Wild Wes
Reviews.Content: Well, Dad is smart but he doesn't want a "smart" phone so this one is just what he likes.  Fairly simple, good-sized buttons.

Reviews.Title: No MMS in USA
Reviews.Author: Douglas Adam Ibrahim
Reviews.Content: This phone performed great but since it is not a U.S. phone, it cannot be used to send or receive picture messages or any other type of data. It can only be used for talk or simple text messages.

Reviews.Title: Samsung S3600i flip phone
Reviews.Author: Robert Guisinger
Reviews.Content: I have a Samsung S3600i. This is a backup. It is new and works fine. The volume is excellent. It is the best flip phone I have had. R.G.
